summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 225 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 941 m), rainfall (down 0.1 mm), feels like temperature (up 1.7°C), and inside temperature (up 1.7°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 225.0m lower than yesterday, 60.5m lower than the past week, 941.1m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 745m to 3580m and averaged 1761.5m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: The clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced. Periods of rain anticipated, the clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected, and bright sunshine will dominate the day. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
